name: Technical PRD
description: Generate a technical PRD with architecture decisions, API contracts, and implementation details for engineering-focused planning
prompt_text: Write a Technical Product Requirements Document for "{feature_name}" that bridges product intent and engineering execution. The current system context is as follows: "{system_context}". Given this baseline, define the target architecture, key technical decisions (with rationale and alternatives considered), API contracts with request/response schemas, data model changes, and migration strategy. The target timeline is {target_timeline}, so scope the implementation plan accordingly with clear milestones and dependencies. Technical constraints to factor into every decision: "{technical_constraints}". Include sections for Architecture Overview with a component diagram description, API Specifications, Data Model Changes, Infrastructure Requirements, Performance Benchmarks, Rollback Strategy, and a detailed Implementation Plan broken into workstreams with effort estimates.

variables.name: system_context
variables.label: Current System Context
variables.placeholder: Describe the existing system architecture, key services, data flows, and relevant technical landscape

variables.name: technical_constraints
variables.label: Technical Constraints
variables.placeholder: e.g., Must maintain backward compatibility with v2 API, latency budget of 200ms p99
